recipesJson.name: Bloody Blackcurrant Custard
recipesJson.author: seanrus99
recipesJson.description: I took inspiration from a bunch of different "Strawberry Cream" recipes. This is a much darker vape, without being too heavy. It's a dam fine S&V but 4 or 5 days in it's even better. It's very sweet so take out the sweetener if want a less sweet vape. If you mix it leave me a note so I can get better at this mixing thing.

reviews.text: Nice recipe man!! Very tasty and well layered. Good job üëèüèª
Fantastic Flavor!! mixed this up just now and I was blown away on every inhale. Can‚Äôt wait to see the flavour after a steep. Great mouthfeel as well. This is very well done!!
